ch.usi.inf.lidr.merging
Class CORI

java.lang.Object
  ch.usi.inf.lidr.merging.CORI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResultsMerging, ScoreNormalization
public class CORI
extends Object
implements ResultsMerging

Results merging/score normalization algorithm that normalizes document scores using MinMax and weighs them by the relevance of the result list.

Author:
Ilya Markov
See Also:
"Searching distributed collections with inference networks", James P. Callan, Zhihong Lu and W. Bruce Croft. In Proceedings of SIGIR, pages 21-28, 1995., "Advances in Information Retrieval, chapter 5. Distributed Information Retrieval", Jamie Callan. Kluwer Academic Publishers, pages 127-150, 2000.

Field Detail

resultListRelevance

private double resultListRelevance
The relevance of a result list (in the range [0, 1]).

IMPORTANT: for a list of document scores to be normalized, the relevance must be set first using setResultListRelevance(double) and only then the normalization should be performed using #normalize(List>). If not set, the relevance 1 is used.

See Also:
setResultListRelevance(double)

lambda

private double lambda
CORI parameter that controls how much weight is given to the relevance of a result list.

normalization

private ScoreNormalization normalization
The basic score normalization algorithm to be used by CORI. By default uses MinMax.

Constructor Detail

CORI

public CORI()
Method Detail

setResultListRelevance

public void setResultListRelevance(double resultListRelevance)
Sets the relevance of a list of document scores to be normalized. The relevance should be in the range [0, 1].

IMPORTANT: this method should be called before #normalize(List>). If the relevance is not set, the value of 1 is used.

Parameters:
resultListRelevance - The relevance of a result list to be normalized.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if resultListRelevance is not in the range [0, 1].
See Also:
resultListRelevance

normalize

public <T> List<ScoredEntity<T>> normalize(List<ScoredEntity<T>> unnormScoredDocs)
IMPORTANT: set the relevance of a result list to be normalized by setResultListRelevance(double) before running this method.

Specified by:
normalize in interface ScoreNormalization
Parameters:
unnormScoredDocs - The list of document scores to be normalized.
Returns:
The list of normalized document scores.
See Also:
ch.usi.inf.lidr.norm.ScoreNormalization#normalize(List>)

getNormalizedScore

protected double getNormalizedScore(double docScore,
                                    double resultListRelevance)
Calculates the CORI normalized document score based on docScore and resultListRelevance.

This method can be overridden by subclasses in order to change the calculation of the normalized document score.

Parameters:
docScore - The document score.
resultListRelevance - The relevance of a corresponding result list.
Returns:
The CORI normalized document score.

reset

private void reset()
Resets resultListRelevance.
